snippet: Mexican bank Grupo Financiero Inbursa <GFINBURO.MX> on Friday said it agreed to buy the Brazilian unit of South Africa's Standard Bank for $45 million (27 million pounds), marking its first foray outside of Mexico....

headline.print_headline: Mexico's Inbursa Buys Standard Bank's Brazil Unit for $45 Million
headline.main: Mexico's Inbursa Buys Standard Bank's Brazil Unit for $45 Million

lead_paragraph: Mexican bank Grupo Financiero Inbursa <GFINBURO.MX> on Friday said it agreed to buy the Brazilian unit of South Africa's Standard Bank for $45 million (27 million pounds), marking its first foray outside of Mexico.
